languages.text: "Когда Ефрат-II, сокровенную кузницу флота Осознание, осадили еретики, Лорд-инквизитор направил туда огромные силы. Сейчас они и отозванные с передовых рубежей эскадры Эксплораторов плечом к плечу бьются с еретиками за священную планету".

traits.locale_text: "Когда Евфрат-II, сокровенную кузницу флота Осознание, осадили еретики, Лорд-инквизитор направил туда огромные силы. Сейчас они и отозванные с передовых рубежей эскадры Эксплораторов плечом к плечу бьются с еретиками за священную планету".
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "When heretics laid siege to Eufrates II, the hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force. Now they and the Explorator squadrons recalled from the front lines stand together against the heretics in the battle for the sacred planet."
languages.original_text: "Когда Ефрат-II, сокровенную кузницу флота Осознание, осадили еретики, Лорд-инквизитор направил туда огромные силы. Сейчас они и отозванные с передовых рубежей эскадры Эксплораторов плечом к плечу бьются с еретиками за священную планету".

traits.locale_text: "When heretics lay siege to Eufrates II, a hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force there. They and Explorator squadrons recalled from frontiers are now standing shoulder to shoulder in a battle against the heretics for the sacred planet."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "When heretics lay siege to Eufrates II, a hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force there. They and Explorator squadrons recalled from frontiers are now standing shoulder to shoulder in a battle against the heretics for the sacred planet."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "When heretics laid siege to Eufrates II, a hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force. Now they and the Explorator squadrons recalled from the front lines stand together against the heretics in the battle for the sacred planet."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "When heretics laid siege to Eufrates II, a hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force. Now they and the Explorator squadrons recalled from the front lines stand together against the heretics in the battle for the sacred planet."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "When heretics laid siege to Eufrates II, the hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force. Now they and the Explorator squadrons recalled from the front lines stand together against the heretics in the battle for the sacred planet."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "When heretics laid siege to Eufrates II, the hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force. Now they and the Explorator squadrons recalled from the front lines stand together against the heretics in the battle for the sacred planet."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Cuando los herejes asediaron Eufrates II, una fragua santificada de la Flota Conciencia, el Lord Inquisidor envió un contingente formidable. Junto con los escuadrones de exploradores que fueron trasladados desde el frente, son la principal fuerza de oposición contra los herejes en la batalla por ese sagrado planeta».
languages.original_text: "When heretics laid siege to Eufrates II, the hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force. Now they and the Explorator squadrons recalled from the front lines stand together against the heretics in the battle for the sacred planet."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando los herejes asediaron Eufrates II, una fragua santificada de la Flota Conciencia, el Lord Inquisidor envió un contingente formidable. Junto con los escuadrones de exploradores que fueron trasladados desde el frente, son la principal fuerza de oposición contra los herejes en la batalla por ese sagrado planeta».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “异端分子对欧夫拉茨二号星进行了围攻，那里是真理开拓者舰队的神圣熔炉。大审判官为此派出了一支规模庞大的军队，与从前线归来的开拓者们一起并肩作战，守卫那颗行星。”
languages.original_text: "When heretics laid siege to Eufrates II, the hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force. Now they and the Explorator squadrons recalled from the front lines stand together against the heretics in the battle for the sacred planet."

traits.locale_text: “异端分子对欧夫拉茨二号星进行了围攻，那里是对真理开拓者舰队的神圣熔炉。审判长为此派出了一支规模庞大的军队，与从前线归来的开拓者们一起并肩作战，守卫那颗行星。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Lorsque les hérétiques ont assiégé Euphrate-II, une forge sacrée de la Flotte de la Connaissance, le seigneur inquisiteur y a envoyé une force de grande ampleur. Depuis, aux côtés des escadrons d'Explorators rappelés du front, il combat les hérétiques pour protéger la planète sacrée. »
languages.original_text: "When heretics laid siege to Eufrates II, the hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force. Now they and the Explorator squadrons recalled from the front lines stand together against the heretics in the battle for the sacred planet."

traits.locale_text: « Lorsque les hérétiques ont assiégé Euphrate-II, une forge sacrée de la Flotte de la Connaissance, le seigneur inquisiteur y a envoyé une force de grande ampleur. Depuis, aux côtés des escadrons d'Explorators rappelés du front, il combat les hérétiques pour protéger la planète sacrée. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「異端者たちがコグニサンス艦隊の神聖な鍛冶場であるユーフラテス・IIを包囲したとき、ロード・インクィジターは大部隊を派遣しました。今、彼らと最前線から呼び戻された探索中隊は、神聖な惑星をめぐる戦いで異端者に立ち向かおうとしています」
languages.original_text: "When heretics laid siege to Eufrates II, the hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force. Now they and the Explorator squadrons recalled from the front lines stand together against the heretics in the battle for the sacred planet."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者たちがコグニサンス艦隊の神聖な鍛冶場であるユーフラテス・IIを包囲したとき、ロード・インクィジターは大部隊を派遣しました。今、彼らと最前線から呼び戻された探索中隊は、神聖な惑星をめぐる戦いで異端者に立ち向かおうとしています」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Als Ketzer Eufrates II belagert haben, eine heilige Schmiede der Erkenntnisflotte, hat der Großinquisitor eine gewaltige Flotte geschickt. Nun bekämpft sie gemeinsam mit den Explorator-Geschwadern, die von der Front abgezogen wurden, die heimtückischen Xenos und versucht, den heiligen Planeten zu retten."
languages.original_text: "When heretics laid siege to Eufrates II, the hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force. Now they and the Explorator squadrons recalled from the front lines stand together against the heretics in the battle for the sacred planet."

traits.locale_text: "Als Ketzer Eufrates II belagert haben, eine heilige Schmiede der Erkenntnisflotte, hat der Großinquisitor eine gewaltige Flotte geschickt. Nun bekämpft sie gemeinsam mit den Explorator-Geschwadern, die von der Front abgezogen wurden, die heimtückischen Xenos und versucht, den heiligen Planeten zu retten."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Kâfirlerin Malumat Filosu'nun kutsal ocağı Eufrates II'yi kuşatması üzerine Lord Engizisyoncu, devasa bir kuvvet gönderdi. Şimdiyse bu kuvvet ve ön cepheden çekilen Keşiftör eskadraları, kutsal gezegen için verilen savaşta kâfirlere karşı omuz omuza savaşıyor."
languages.original_text: "When heretics laid siege to Eufrates II, the hallowed forge of the Cognisance Fleet, the Lord Inquisitor sent an enormous force. Now they and the Explorator squadrons recalled from the front lines stand together against the heretics in the battle for the sacred planet."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirler, Malumat Filosu'nun kutsal ocağı Eufrates II'yi kuşattığında Lord Engizisyoncu devasa bir kuvvet gönderdi. Şimdiyse bu kuvvet ve Keşiftör eskadraları ön cepheden çekildi ve kutsal gezegenin savaşında kâfirlere karşı omuz omuza savaşıyorlar."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
